mapper.update: update tb_video_play_log set click_play = #{count} where video_id = #{videoId}
mapper.select: select id, video_id, click_play from tb_video_play_log
select user_id userId, online_sec onlineSec, child_online childOnline from tb_user_online where user_id = #{userId} and online_date = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')
mapper.update: update tb_user_online set online_sec = #{count}, end_time = REPLACE(unix_timestamp(current_timestamp(3)),'.','') where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_user_online_his where online_date < date_format(date_sub(now(),interval 90 day),'%Y%m%d');
delete from tb_user_online where online_date = date_format(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day),'%Y%m%d');
mapper.select: select user_id userId, online_sec onlineSec, child_online childOnline from tb_user_online where online_date = date_format(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day),'%Y%m%d');
